remarks: Associative law for class composition.  Theorem 27 of [Suppes] p. 64. Also Exercise 21 of [Enderton] p. 53.  Interestingly, this law holds for any classes whatsoever, not just functions or even relations. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-1997.)
statement: coass $p |- ( ( A o. B ) o. C ) = ( A o. ( B o. C ) ) $.
